about_the_game:
Go on a scary adventure, whether you decide to face the dangerous path alone or team up with your friends. This intense game guarantees a mysterious experience every time you play. Get ready to solve tricky puzzles, avoid a terrifying monster, and fight your way out of the intricate maze.

COOP
Gather your friends and join exciting multiplayer matches, where up to 4 players can team up to overcome challenges and save yourselves. Coordinate your efforts, communicate effectively, and rely on each other's strengths to navigate the treacherous maze and emerge victorious.

PROCEDURAL MAZE
Each step you take into the abyss unveils a fresh, mind-bending challenge within the ever-shifting corridors of the procedurally generated maze.

RANDOM PUZZLES
Prepare to confront a myriad of enigmas, minigames that morph and transform with every playthrough, ensuring an endlessly captivating experience.

VARIOUS CHARACTERS
The labyrinth shows no preferences, whether you are a lawyer or a rugby player, once inside, you start running.

RANDOM GIFTS
Throw the Daedalus coins into the scattered wells throughout the labyrinth and obtain gifts, such as energy potions or the cloak of invisibility, that will be helpful on your journey towards darkness.

HUNTING
Feel the creeping dread as a relentless and nightmarish creature prowls in relentless pursuit throughout your treacherous journey within the maze's shadowy passages.

DIFFICULTY LEVELS
Choose from various levels of difficulty: are you brave enough to face the labyrinth in all its darkness and malevolence?

NOWHERE TO HIDE
Be careful, as the maze is always aware of your presence, and there's nowhere to hide. Your only choice is to run as fast as you can, desperately searching for a way to escape.

MYSTERY
Explore the echoes of a forgotten civilization, where the maze holds hidden secrets and unimaginable wonders. What awaits beyond its ancient walls? Find out through your brave exploration.

name: Daedalus: You Have Been Chosen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Quad core or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Get ready to solve tricky puzzles, avoid a terrifying monster, and fight your way out of the intricate maze.
